text:
Thanks for the kind words. 

Happy to connect. If you’re ever looking for a new position, we’re always hiring A-players.

Hi Everybody - we are looking for a HubSpot developer with great design skills and taste to help us tweak a design into the POWER theme we bought. If you are interested write me at <mailto:mail@soundtracktor.com|mail@soundtracktor.com> - Cheers Nicolai

<Http://www.Remotish.agency|Http://www.Remotish.agency> is developing a brand new role "WebOps Project Manager". 

This role will direct 2 HubSpot Developers (and growing), receive tasks from account leads or manage the relationship of larger web projects, scope projects, task out work, qc, run feedback rounds with clients, and deliver finalized work to clients. 

Great role for a developer looking to get out if the grunt work or a very savvy technical PM who know the HubSpot CMS in and out.

No design work to deal with, it's all just dev!

USA or Brazil residents (unless you can really convince me to change my mind).

DM me your LinkedIn if you want me to notify you when it's open to applicants.
